item.title: Inventory Transfer Entry: Dual Personality
item.description:
When people hear “Inventory Transfer Entry,” they usually think of moving an item between locations. However, this function (found in Transactions»Project) is actually a project accounting tool with multiple uses. If you use Project Accounting with Inventory, you probably recognize this as the step after receiving a project-related item. Here’s a typical project accounting purchase and inventory workflow: A purchase order for an inventory item is recorded and linked to a project and cost category, increasing the committed cost on the project budget...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/inventory-transfer-entry-dual-personality/
